§e -Grants more Damage the deeper in water you are (Maximum 10 Damage)
item.brutality.atomic_judgement.on_hit.1: §e -Generates a nuclear explosion at the target's location
item.brutality.atomic_judgement.on_hold_: §e -Launch yourself into the air, exploding when reaching the ground
item.brutality.biomech_reactor.on_hit.1: §e -Damages mobs in a 10 block radius from the point of impact
item.brutality.biomech_reactor.when_thro: §e -Throws out a biomechanical reactor that seeks out the nearest enemy after a while
§e -Additionally deal 8% of the target's current health as Physical Damage
§e -Applies §3Ruined §efor 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to slow the target by 30% for 1 second
§e -Launches a §3Spectral Maw§e in front of the user that applies §6Stunned §efor 3 ticks
§e -§3Spectral Maw§e distance is based on charge time
item.brutality.butter_gauntlets_hands.pa: §e -True melee hits inflict §6Stunned §efor 4 ticks, with a base chance of 10%, increasing 2% with each level of §aLuck
item.brutality.crease_of_creation.lore.1: Gravity is a harness, I have harnessed the harness.
item.brutality.crease_of_creation.on_hol: §e -Select an §rEntity§e and manipulate them to your will
item.brutality.crease_of_creation.on_shi: §e -Launches the §rSelected Entity§e away from the player
item.brutality.crypto_wallet_charm.passi: §e -Converts §5EndCoins§e and §4NetherCoins§e into Attack Damage and Attack Speed respectively
item.brutality.darkin_blade.lore: I am not your enemy, I am The Enemy!
item.brutality.darkin_blade.passive.1: §e -Every few seconds, charge up an empowered attack
item.brutality.darkin_blade.passive.2: §e -The attack does an additional 10% max health Magic Damage and heals
item.brutality.darkin_scythe.on_right_cl: §e -Damages enemies up to 7 blocks in front of the user
§e -Damages enemies up to 5 blocks in front of the user, additionally knocks up hit mobs

item.brutality.darkin_scythe.passive.1: §e -Gain 40% movement speed and you can phase through mobs
item.brutality.depth_crusher.when_thrown: §e -Launches a Depth Crusher that bounces off walls
item.brutality.doomfist_gauntlet.ability: Charge up a forceful punch that launches the user forwards, transfer the user's kinetic energy into any opposing mobs within its radius.
item.brutality.doomfist_gauntlet.lore: Wielded by a long line of Doomfists, it embodies raw power and ambition. With each devastating punch, it echoes dominance upon the battlefield.
item.brutality.double_down.on_hold_right: §e -Transmutes into a random sword, gaining their abilities and stats
§e -The random sword will have a maximum of §c50 durability §eand will revert once broken
§e -Stronger swords are §eharder to roll, chances are increased with each level of §aLuck
item.brutality.dueling_glove_hands.passi: §9 +1.5x Damage dealt to the nearest mob
item.brutality.dull_knife.on_right_click: §e -Swap between 4 different emotions, granting different buffs and debuffs
item.brutality.dull_knife.passive.1: §e -Channel different emotions to augment yourself. Only works in §cMain Hand
item.brutality.dull_knife.sad.desc.1: 50% of all Damage instead lowers hunger
item.brutality.event_horizon.on_hold_rig: §e -Dislodge the §0Black Hole§e, moving it above the user
§e -The §0Black Hole§e pulls in nearby mobs, dealing Damage
item.brutality.excalibur.ability.desc.1: Crouch Right click to awaken the blade, sheathing it in a holy aura. While in this form, the wielder is capable of sending out waves of sword energy, rapidly draining durability in the process.
item.brutality.excalibur.ability.desc.2: While in the awakened form, all nearby entities are slowed down.
item.brutality.excalibur.lore: The legendary blade of kings, forged in Avalon and imbued with divine light. Its power reflects the courage of its wielder, a beacon of hope and justice.
item.brutality.exoblade.on_swing.1: §e -Summons 4 sword beams that home in on the nearest enemy
item.brutality.exponential_charm.passive: §e -Initiates a combo, resets upon attacking a different mob, or after 5 seconds
§e -A maximum of 15 hits can be in a combo before it is reset
item.brutality.fallen_scythe.ability.des: Gain permanent Attack Damage when on_killing a mob, max of 18 Damage.
item.brutality.fallen_scythe.lore: Forged in the shadows of forgotten battles, this scything blade hungers for the souls of the fallen. With each life it claims, its power grows, echoing the whispers of those it has slain.
item.brutality.first_explosion.lore.1: Darkness blacker than black and darker than dark, I beseech thee, combine with my deep crimson.
item.brutality.first_explosion.lore.3: Justice, fallen upon the infallible boundary, appear now as intangible distortions!
item.brutality.frostmourne.on_right_clic: §e -Right click to unleash a wave of icy death, damaging enemies in a 15 block radius.
§e -You gain §bResistance§e and §cStrength§e and §aheal §escaling with each enemy hit
item.brutality.frostmourne.on_shift_righ: §e -Summons several strays that fight for the user
§e -A maximum of 10 strays can be summoned at a time
item.brutality.frozen_heart.passive.1: §e -Inflicts §7Slowness I§e and §fMining Fatigue I§e to nearby mobs
item.brutality.gungnir.lore: Has yet to miss a target
item.brutality.gungnir.when_thrown.1: §e -Throws a spear that locks into the nearest target in a 25 block radius
item.brutality.gungnir.when_thrown.2: §e -The spear will home onto the target until it is hit 3 times
item.brutality.heart_of_gold.passive.1: §e -50% of Damage taken is reapplied as §6Absorption

item.brutality.hf_murasama.passive.1: §e -Half of all Damage dealt pierces through armor
item.brutality.jackpot.lore: Just give me one more chance...
Push nearby entities away with force, ideal for clearing out areas quickly.
item.brutality.leaf_blower.lore: A powerful yet lightweight tool for clearing debris with ease. Perfect for everyday yard work, it makes quick work of unwanted clutter.

§e -Light arrows deal extra Damage to undead, pierce multiple mobs and have less gravity
item.brutality.providence.passive.1: §e -Does not consume arrows, only works when directly under the Sun
item.brutality.quantum_drill.ability.des: Mining speed increases based on the number of unique blocks around you, making resource gathering faster and more efficient.
item.brutality.quantum_drill.lore: A groundbreaking tool forged from the rarest cosmic elements, this drill utilizes quantum mechanics to enhance its mining speed. Each unique block nearby resonates with its energy, amplifying excavation capabilities.
item.brutality.resplendent_feather_charm: §e -Heal for every burning mob in a 12 block radius
item.brutality.rhitta.lore: The one who stands at the pinnacle of all races
item.brutality.rhitta.passive.1: §e -Gets stronger the closer it is to Noon

item.brutality.terraton_hammer.ability.d: Deal massive Damage at the cost of movement and Attack Speed.
Decreased attack and movement speed while in hand.
item.brutality.terraton_hammer.lore: Forged from the unyielding core of an ancient golem, this colossal hammer carries the weight of forgotten eons. Each strike echoes with the power of the earth, capable of shattering stone and bone alike. Wield it wisely, for its strength demands a heavy toll.
§e -Retrieves and loads data from the cloud

Gain 100% increased experience from all sources.
item.brutality.truthseeker.lore: In the relentless pursuit of knowledge, its blade carves through the veil of ignorance, severing falsehoods and casting light into the darkest corners of understanding. Each on_swing carries the weight of unspoken truths, leaving a path of shattered illusions and unyielding clarity in its wake.
